practice_phrases: If you want
如果你想
If you want to listen
如果你想听
If you want to count them
如果你想数它们
If you want to seem crazy
如果你想显得疯狂
If you want to win the game
如果你想赢得比赛
If you want to choose the wrong job
如果你想选择错误的工作
If you want to seem as though you don't care
如果你想显得好像你不在乎
If you want to go outside in this dreadful weather
如果你想在这糟糕的天气出去
If you want, she won't listen to every word you say
如果你想，她不会听你说的每一个字
If you want to, but it's getting late
如果你想，但天晚了

seed_context.known: 如果你想不开车离开，我不介意。
seed_context.target: I don't mind if you want to leave without the car.

practice_phrases: Without the car
不开车
If you want without the car
如果你想不开车
I don't want without the car
我不想不开车
She doesn't want without the car
她不想不开车
If you want to go without the car
如果你想不开车去
Unless you want without the car
除非你想不开车
If you want to go outside without the car
如果你想不开车出去
I used to think you wanted without the car
我以前认为你想不开车
Unless they're lucky, they want to go without the car
除非他们运气好，他们想不开车去
But without the car, if you want
但不开车，如果你想

seed_context.known: 如果你想不开车离开，我不介意。
seed_context.target: I don't mind if you want to leave without the car.

practice_phrases: Leave without the car
不开车离开
If you want to leave without the car
如果你想不开车离开
I don't want to leave without the car
我不想不开车离开
She doesn't want to leave without the car
她不想不开车离开
They don't want to leave without the car
他们不想不开车离开
Unless you want to leave without the car
除非你想不开车离开
If you want to leave without the car, but it's getting late
如果你想不开车离开，但天晚了
I used to think you wanted to leave without the car
我以前认为你想不开车离开
She doesn't want to seem as though she wants to leave without the car
她不想显得好像她想不开车离开
I don't mind if you want to leave without the car.
如果你想不开车离开，我不介意。
